basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus circulans (MIC=12 µg/ml), Bacillus coagulans CECT 12 (MIC=2 µg/ml), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=4 µg/ml), Bacillus stearothermophilus CECT 49 (MIC=14 µg/ml), Bacillus stearothermophilus CECT 148 (MIC=12 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=12 µg/ml), Paenibacillus macerans CECT 19 (MIC=4 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis ssp.faecalis S-13 (MIC=6 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp.faecalis S-14 (MIC=8 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp.faecalis S-32 (MIC=12 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp.faecalis S-86 (MIC=8 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp.liquefaciens S-39 (MIC=6 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp.liquefaciens S-40 (MIC=8 µg/ml), E. faecalis ssp. liquefaciens S-47 (MIC=12 µg/ml).
